data.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references describing the data.

description.description: A short description of the dataset

environment.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the environments associated to the dataset.

networks.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the networks in the dataset.

owner.description: A single related resource. Can be either a URI or set of nested resource data.

papers.description: List of identifiers (or URIs) of the references to the papers associated with the dataset.

public.description: Whether the dataset can be viewed by all users
